content: phazelia s laptop case some crocheters asked me to publish the pattern of the laptop case i won t give you a real „pattern but some basic instructions to start with this project i used „catania a cotton yarn 125 metres/50 grams and a 2 0 mm hook you need 17 crocheted hexagons 15 + 2 i crocheted the hexagons together with for closure single_crochet crocheted hexagon cast on a chain with 6 stitches join with a slip_stitch to a ring make 12 stitches into the ring join with a slip_stitch in each row there are 6 increases 2 stiches in one stitch of the row below *work two single_crochet stitches in one stitch of the row below then one single_crochet* repeat 5x *work two single_crochet stitches in one stitch of the row below then two single_crochet stitches* repeat 5x *work two single_crochet stitches in one stitch of the row below then three single_crochet* repeat 5x continue this way i changed colours after 2 row and worked 18 row for each hexagon one hexagon is 6 25 inches from one edge to the opposite edge the laptop case is 15 75 x 12 inches i lined it with interlining and corduroy fabric for closure i added velcro contact phazelia@yahoo com or send a ravelry message to phazelia i hope you enjoy the pattern
